title: 95/536/EC: Commission Decision of 6 December 1995 amending Commission Decisions 92/160/EEC and 93/197/EEC in relation to the regionalization of Egypt for the imports of registered horses (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 December 1995 amending Commission Decisions 92/160/EEC and 93/197/EEC in relation to the regionalization of Egypt for the imports of registered horses (Text with EEA relevance) (95/536/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Decision 92/160/EEC the words 'Egypt (2) Metropolitan area of Cairo` are replaced by:
'Egypt
Governorates of Alexandria, Beheira, Kafr El Sheikh, Damietta, Dakahlia, Port-Said, Sharkia, Gharbia, Menoufia, Kalioubia, Ishmailia, North Sinai, South Sinai, Cairo (as Greater Cairo including Giza-town), Suez, MarsaMartrouh, Fayoum, Giza and Beni Suef`.

Decision 93/197/EEC is amended as follows:
1. At Annex I the word 'Egypt (1) (2)` is replaced in alphabetical order into the list of third countries in Group E.
2. At Annex II the word 'Egypt` is inserted in alphabetical order into the title of the model Health Certificate E and is thereby added to the list of third countries from which imports of registered horses into the Community are permitted.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 December 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
